item.title: Amid Two-Week Internet Blackout, Some Iranians Are Getting Back Online - The New York Times
item.description: Amid Two-Week Internet Blackout, Some Iranians Are Getting Back Online The New York TimesIran president’s son urges authorities to restore internet after protests blackout The GuardianIranian telecom head claims internet to soon be restored after protest blackout timesofisrael.comHow Elon Musk’s Starlink is beating Iran’s internet blackout The TelegraphIranian merchants have 20 minutes of supervised internet access per day for transactions - repo…
